metadata.title: CVE-2022-0806 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Data leak in Canvas in Google Chrome prior to 99.0.4844.51 allowed a remoteattacker who convinced a user to engage in screen sharing to potentiallyleak cross-origin data via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
